name: Homerun To Earth
description:
This is a sort of a sequel to my first game, which was also my first entry to a gamejam – lovely.  I used this mostly as a practice for my future big project, as it is based on a tutorial by Blackthronprod. However, most of the assets and scripts are my work, the same goes with the idea. 

I hope you will enjoy it at least a little and if you can, don't be shy to write me a review! You can here in the comments or on my social media.
